site1.title: Welcome
site1.description:
prixradio: <1 - 96>
prixsetchannel: Set a voice channel.

Have you an issue or the bot is offline? Join our support server:
https://discord.gg/9QU4GaBNpa

site2.title: Music
site2.description:
prixlautfm: <Laut FM>
prixradio: 1 - 96
prixplay: <Youtube Song>
prixstop: Stop the Music
prixstream: <mp3 stream>
prixrandom: play an random Mp3
prixnowplaying: Show your nowplaying audio

site3.title: Settings
site3.description:
prixsetprefix: Set a new prefix
prixprefix: Shows you prefix
prixresetprefix: Resets your prefix
prixsetchannel: Set a reconnect channel
prixrmchannel: Remove the reconnect channel

site4.title: Others
site4.description:

prixlink: Shows you the important links
